import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { AuthenContext } from "../context/AuthenContext" import duong from "../../images/login-page-4468581-3783954.webp" import { Link, useNavigate, useNavigation } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" const Register = () => { const list = useContext(AuthenContext) const navigation = useNavigate() const SubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:8000/user/register", list.forms) .then(res => { navigation("/login") }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }) } return (
